segmentosSRT.text:
I never had to beg
when I ran the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: If I hadn't lost my home to him...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
Surely not. We lost that status to Long'er.
So, what are we?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: You have to go smelt steel.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: put your dumplings in hot water.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Make sure you make them hot enough.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Cold dumplings are bad for the tummy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: If Youqing does as daddy says...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: our lives will get better and better.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: When it grows up, it becomes a goose.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: And that'll turn into a sheep.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: The sheep will turn into an ox.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
And there'll be dumplings and meat
every day.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: It was you who killed my son?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: I had only one son, Chunsheng!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: No idea! The leader is a cripple.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Mr. Niu said he was a Red Guard.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Come on, you can't cry today.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Haven't had much to do with him for years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Don't go getting any stupid ideas.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: You must bear it, no matter what!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: You can't take that road yourself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: I don't want to live anymore!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: No, thank you, I've got to go.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
- Sorry for the trouble.
- It's our job.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text:
- Already?
- We didn't hear a sound.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segmentosSRT.text: Did he eat all seven buns?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_00
